title: Default Search Input
description: A simple search bar with icon
yamlCode:
- search_input_container:
Control: GroupContainer
Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
Properties:
BorderColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BORDER_COLOR
BorderThickness: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
Fill: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BK_INPUT
Height: |-
=LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.LAYOUT.INPUT_HEIGHT
LayoutGap: =LookUp(THEMING ,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.SPACING_BASELINE * 2
LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
PaddingBottom: =Self.PaddingTop
PaddingLeft: =16
PaddingRight: =Self.PaddingLeft
RadiusBottomLeft: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
RadiusBottomRight: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
RadiusTopLeft: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
RadiusTopRight: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
Width: =250
X: =35
Y: =72
Children:
- search_icon:
Control: Image
Properties:
Image: |-
="data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & EncodeUrl(
"<svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" viewBox=""0 -960
960 960"" fill='" & If(
Self.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled,
Substitute(
JSON(
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
),
Char(34),
""
),
Substitute(
JSON(
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.ICON.COLOR
),
Char(34),
""
)
) & "'" & "><path d="" M784-120 532-372q-30 24-69 38t-83 14q109 0-184.5-75.5T120-580q0-109 75.5-184.5T380-840q109 0 184.5 75.5T640-580q0
44-14 83t-38 69l252 252-56 56ZM380-400q75 0 127.5-52.5T560-580q0-75-52.5-
127.5T380-760q-75 0-127.5 52.5T200-580q0 75 52.5 127.5T380-400Z ""/></svg>"
)
AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Center
BorderColor: =Color.Transparent
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledFill: =Self.Fill
Height: =LookUp(THEMING, ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.ICON.SIZE_DEFAULT
HoverBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
HoverFill: =Self.Fill
PressedBorderColor: =Self.HoverBorderColor
PressedFill: =Self.HoverFill
Width: =LookUp(THEMING, ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.ICON.SIZE_DEFAULT
X: =430
Y: =220
- search_input_field:
Control: Classic/TextInput
Properties:
Default: =
HintText: ="Suche"
AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Center
BorderColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BORDER_COLOR
BorderThickness: =0
Color: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.COLOR
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
DisabledFill: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_FILL
Fill: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BK_INPUT
FillPortions: =1
FocusedBorderThickness: =Self.BorderThickness
Font: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.TYPE
FontWeight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.FONT_WEIGHT.DEFAULT
HoverBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
Default Gallery
HoverColor: =Self.Color
HoverFill: =Self.Fill
LayoutMinWidth: =10
PaddingBottom: =0
PaddingLeft: |+
=0
PaddingRight: =Self.PaddingLeft
PaddingTop: =0
PressedBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor

THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
RadiusBottomRight: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
RadiusTopLeft: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
RadiusTopRight: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
Size: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.SIZE_TINY

title: Item Gallery
yamlCode:
- item_gallery:
Control: Gallery
Variant: BrowseLayout_Vertical_TwoTextOneImageVariant_ver5.0
Properties:
DelayItemLoading: =true
Height: =466
Layout: =Layout.Vertical
LoadingSpinner: =LoadingSpinner.Data
TemplatePadding: |+
=LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.SPACING_BASELINE
TemplateSize: =80
Width: =300
X: =425
Y: =235
Children:
- item_hitbox:
Control: Button
Properties:
OnSelect: =Select(Parent)
Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Transparent
Text: =" "
Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight
Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
- content_container:
Control: GroupContainer
Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
Properties:
BorderColor: =If(ThisItem.IsSelected, LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.PRIMARY, LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BORDER_COLOR)
BorderThickness: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
Fill: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BK_CONTAINER
Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Self.Y*2
LayoutGap: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.SPACING_BASELINE * 2
LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
PaddingLeft: =24
PaddingRight: =Self.PaddingLeft
RadiusBottomLeft: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
RadiusBottomRight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
RadiusTopLeft: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
RadiusTopRight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth - Self.X*2
X: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
Y: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
Children:
- example_icon:
Control: Image
Properties:
Image: |-
="data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & EncodeUrl(
"<svg xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"" viewBox=""0
-960 960 960"" fill='" & If(
Self.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled,
Substitute(
JSON(
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
),
Char(34),
""
),
Substitute(
JSON(
If(
ThisItem.IsSelected,
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.PRIMARY,
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.ICON.COLOR
)
),
Char(34),
""
)
) & "'" & "><path d=""
M320-240h320v-80H320v80Zm0-160h320v-80H320v80ZM240-80q-33 0-
56.5-23.5T160-160v-640q0-33 23.5-56.5T240-880h320l240 240v480q0 33-23.5
56.5T720-80H240Zm280-520h200L520-800v200Z
""/></svg>"
)
AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Center
Height: =LookUp(THEMING, ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.ICON.SIZE_DEFAULT
Width: =Self.Height
- information_content_container:
Control: GroupContainer
Variant: verticalAutoLayoutContainer
Properties:
DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
LayoutJustifyContent: =LayoutJustifyContent.Center
LayoutMinHeight: =10
LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
RadiusBottomLeft: =0
RadiusBottomRight: =0
RadiusTopLeft: =0
RadiusTopRight: =0
Children:
- item_title_label:
Control: Label
Properties:
Text: ="Title"
AutoHeight: =true
BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 0)
Color: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.COLOR
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
DisabledFill: =Color.Transparent
Font: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.TYPE
FontWeight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.FONT_WEIGHT.TITLE
LayoutMinWidth: =10
PaddingBottom: =0
PaddingLeft: =0
PaddingRight: =0
PaddingTop: =0
Size: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.SIZE_DEFAULT
- item_subtitle_label:
Control: Label
Properties:
Text: ="Subtitle"
AutoHeight: =true
Search input with animated icon
BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 0)
Color: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.COLOR
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
DisabledFill: =Color.Transparent
Font: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.TYPE
FontWeight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.FONT_WEIGHT.DEFAULT

THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.SIZE_TINY

title: Search bar animated
description: A search bar with an animated icon.
yamlCode:
- rounded_search_input_container:
Control: GroupContainer
Variant: horizontalAutoLayoutContainer
Properties:
BorderColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BORDER_COLOR
BorderThickness: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
Fill: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BK_INPUT
Height: |-
=LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.LAYOUT.INPUT_HEIGHT
LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Center
LayoutGap: =LookUp(THEMING ,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.SPACING_BASELINE * 2
LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
PaddingBottom: =Self.PaddingTop
PaddingLeft: =16
RadiusBottomLeft: =Self.Height
RadiusBottomRight: =Self.Height
RadiusTopLeft: =Self.Height
RadiusTopRight: =Self.Height
Width: =250
X: =35
Y: =153
Children:
- animated_search_icon:
Control: Image
Properties:
Image: "=\"data:image/svg+xml;utf8,\" & EncodeUrl(\n \"<svg
xmlns=\"\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\"\" viewBox=\"\"0 -960 960 960\"\"
fill=\"\"url(#text-gradient)\"\">\n \n <defs>\n <linearGradient
id=\"\"text-gradient\"\" x1=\"\"0%\"\" y1=\"\"0%\"\" x2=\"\"100%\"\"
y2=\"\"0%\"\"> \n <stop offset=\"\"0%\"\" stopcolor=\"\"#F79533\"\">\n <animate attributeName=\"\"stopcolor\"\" values=\"\"#F79533; #F37055; #EF4E7B; #A166AB; #5073B8; #1098AD;
#07B39B; #6DBA82; #F79533\"\" dur=\"\"4s\"\" repeatCount=\"\"indefinite\"\">
</animate>\n </stop>\n <stop offset=\"\"100%\"\" stopcolor=\"\"#F79533\"\">\n <animate attributeName=\"\"stopcolor\"\" values=\"\"#F37055; #EF4E7B; #A166AB; #5073B8; #1098AD; #07B39B;
#6DBA82; #F79533; #F37055\"\" dur=\"\"4s\"\" repeatCount=\"\"indefinite\"\">
</animate>\n </stop>\n </linearGradient>\n </defs>\n
<path d=\"\" M784-120 532-372q-30 24-69 38t-83 14q-109 0-184.5-75.5T120-580q0-
109 75.5-184.5T380-840q109 0 184.5 75.5T640-580q0 44-14 83t-38 69l252 252-56
56ZM380-400q75 0 127.5-52.5T560-580q0-75-52.5-127.5T380-760q-75 0-127.5
52.5T200-580q0 75 52.5 127.5T380-400Z \"\"/></svg>\"\n)"
BorderColor: =Color.Transparent
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledFill: =Self.Fill
Height: =Self.Width
HoverBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
HoverFill: =Self.Fill
PressedBorderColor: =Self.HoverBorderColor
PressedFill: =Self.HoverFill
Width: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.ICON.SIZE_LARGE
X: =430
Y: =220
- animated_search_input_field:
Control: Classic/TextInput
Properties:
Default: =
HintText: ="Suche"
AlignInContainer: =AlignInContainer.Stretch
BorderColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.BORDER_COLOR
BorderThickness: =0
Color: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.COLOR
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledColor: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
DisabledFill: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_FILL
Fill: =Color.Transparent
FillPortions: =1
FocusedBorderThickness: =Self.BorderThickness
Font: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.TYPE
FontWeight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.FONT_WEIGHT.DEFAULT
HoverBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
HoverColor: =Self.Color
HoverFill: =Self.Fill
LayoutMinWidth: =10
PaddingBottom: =0
PaddingLeft: =0
PaddingRight: |+
=0
PaddingTop: =0
PressedBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
RadiusBottomLeft: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
RadiusBottomRight: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
RadiusTopLeft: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft
Modern Dropdown with indicator
RadiusTopRight: =Self.RadiusBottomLeft

title: Modern Control Dropdown
yamlCode:
- modern_dropdown_container:
Control: GroupContainer
Variant: verticalAutoLayoutContainer
Properties:
DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
Height: =modern_dropdown_field.Y + modern_dropdown_field.Height
LayoutAlignItems: =LayoutAlignItems.Stretch
LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
LayoutGap: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.SPACING_BASELINE
LayoutMode: =LayoutMode.Auto
PaddingBottom: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
PaddingLeft: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
PaddingRight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
RadiusBottomLeft: =0
RadiusBottomRight: =0
RadiusTopLeft: =0
RadiusTopRight: =0
Width: =227
X: =35
Y: =235
Children:
- modern_dropdown_title:
Control: Label
Properties:
Text: ="Dropdown"
AutoHeight: =true
BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 0)
Color: |-
=If(
IsBlank(modern_dropdown_field.Selected),
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.INVALID,
LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.FONT.COLOR
)
DisabledBorderColor: =Self.BorderColor
DisabledColor: =LookUp(THEMING ,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.DISABLED_COLOR
DisabledFill: =Self.Fill
Font: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.TYPE
FontWeight: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.FONT_WEIGHT.DEFAULT
Height: =50
PaddingBottom: =0
PaddingLeft: =0
PaddingRight: =0
PaddingTop: =0
Size: =LookUp(THEMING,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.SIZE_SMALL
Width: =515
- modern_dropdown_field:
Control: DropDown
Variant: pcfdataset
Properties:
Appearance: ='DropdownCanvas.Appearance'.FilledLighter
BasePaletteColor: =LookUp(THEMING ,ID =
Single line Input
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.PRIMARY
BorderColor: =LookUp(THEMING ,ID = THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.INVALID
BorderRadius: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_RADIUS
BorderThickness: =LookUp(THEMING,ID =
THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.LAYOUT.BORDER_SIZE
DefaultSelectedItems: =Blank()
Height: |-
=LookUp(
THEMING,
ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.LAYOUT.INPUT_HEIGHT
LayoutMinWidth: =10

THEME_MODE_ID).VALUES.FONT.FONT_WEIGHT.DEFAULT

=LookUp(

ID = THEME_MODE_ID
).VALUES.LAYOUT.INPUT_HEIGHT
